definition: full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: Both Rendell and Casey have put their prestige on the line in this election.
sentences.chinese: 伦德尔和凯西的威望和他们的选举倾向一致。

sentences.english: This retiring attitude enhanced his prestige.
sentences.chinese: 他这种与世无争的态度更增加了他的威望。

sentences.english: Third, the prestige that comes with success commands respect.
sentences.chinese: 第三，伴随成功而来的威望可以博得尊重。

sentences.english: E. g. refused to abase herself by asking for an invitation.
sentences.chinese: 因请求得到他人的邀请被拒绝而使自己的威望降低。

sentences.english: Refused to abase herself by asking for an invitation.
sentences.chinese: 因请求得到他人的邀请被拒绝而使自己的威望降低。

sentences.english: After work, you might unwind with a cold bottle of Hundred Prestige.
sentences.chinese: 下班后要来一杯百种威望。

sentences.english: Wang is in charge of the film and performing arts classes Chaoqun, high prestige, is the first authoritative film industry.
sentences.chinese: 掌班王华更是影艺超群，威望甚高，乃影界第一权威。

sentences.english: But as the moon lifted off the ridge it gathered firmness and authority.
sentences.chinese: 但是，当月亮升至山脊之上时，它聚足了坚定与威望。

sentences.english: It's got more than a century experience and prestige .
sentences.chinese: 它有一个世纪左右有办报经验和威望。

sentences.english: He reacquired an academic reputation after five years of hard work.
sentences.chinese: 经过了五年的苦干，他重新赢得了学术上的威望。

sentences.english: Leaders on both sides have staked personal prestige and their legacies on the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 两岸领导人的个人威望和历史功绩都要看会谈结果。

sentences.english: Vivendi will be the biggest shareholder in the group.
sentences.chinese: 威望迪将成为集团最大股东。

sentences.english: In ancient times his family was both large, and reputable.
sentences.chinese: 他家在古代可是有威望的大姓。

sentences.english: The Skopje International Jazz Festival has become a highly prestigious music event.
sentences.chinese: 斯科里普国际爵士乐节，享有高度的威望。

sentences.english: The fostering of international prestige depends on the implementation of proper policy to enhance prestige.
sentences.chinese: 国际威望的树立取决于良好的威望政策的实施。

sentences.english: The fostering of international prestige depends on the implementation of proper policy to enhance prestige.
sentences.chinese: 国际威望的树立取决于良好的威望政策的实施。

definition: Weixin county in Zhaotong 昭通[Zhao1 tong1], Yunnan
to have the power to rally supporters
a person of virtue and prestige/a person of good moral standing and reputation
